options.name: Get
options.description: Get a membership

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many memberships in a space

properties.name: memberId
properties.description: Member to be retrieved in the form "spaces/*/members/*"

properties.name: spaceId
properties.description: The name of the space for which to retrieve members, in the form "spaces/*". Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a message

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a message

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a message

options.name: Send and Wait for Response
options.description: Send a message and wait for response
options.action: Send message and wait for response

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a message

properties.name: spaceId
properties.description: Space resource name, in the form "spaces/*". Example: spaces/AAAAMpdlehY. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: jsonParameters
properties.description: Whether to pass the message object as JSON

properties.name: jsonNotice
properties.displayName: See Google Chat Guide To Creating Messages

properties.name: messageJson
properties.description: Message input as JSON Object or JSON String

options.name: requestId
options.description: A unique request ID for this message. If a message has already been created in the space with this request ID, the subsequent request will return the existing message and no new message will be created.

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Resource name of the message to be deleted, in the form "spaces//messages/"

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Resource name of the message to be retrieved, in the form "spaces//messages/"

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Resource name of the message to be updated, in the form "spaces//messages/"

properties.name: jsonParameters
properties.description: Whether to pass the update fields object as JSON

properties.name: jsonNotice
properties.displayName: See Google Chat Guide To Creating Messages

properties.name: updateFieldsJson
properties.description: Message input as JSON Object or JSON String

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a space

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many spaces the caller is a member of

properties.name: spaceId
properties.description: Resource name of the space, in the form "spaces/*"

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: spaceId
properties.description: Space resource name, in the form "spaces/*". Example: spaces/AAAAMpdlehY. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: Approval
options.description: User can approve/disapprove from within the message

options.name: Free Text
options.description: User can submit a response via a form

options.name: Custom Form
options.description: User can submit a response via a custom form

properties.name: jsonOutput

values.name: fieldLabel
values.description: Label that appears above the input field

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-filled in the form field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default date value that will be pre-filled in the form field (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-selected. Must match one of the option labels.

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value(s) that will be pre-selected. Must match one or multiple of the option labels. Separate multiple pre-selected options with a comma.

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.displayName: Multiple Choice is a legacy option, please use Checkboxes or Radio Buttons field type instead
values.name: multiselectLegacyNotice
multiselect
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes
values.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

options.name: limitWaitTime
options.description: Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type

values.name: limitType
values.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.

options.name: After Time Interval
options.description: Waits for a certain amount of time

options.name: At Specified Time
options.description: Waits until the set date and time to continue

values.name: resumeAmount
values.description: The time to wait

values.name: resumeUnit
values.description: Unit of the interval value

values.name: maxDateAndTime
values.description: Continue execution after the specified date and time

options.name: appendAttribution
options.description: Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message

options.name: responseFormTitle
options.description: Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response

options.name: responseFormDescription
options.description: Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response

options.name: responseFormCustomCss
options.description: Override default styling of the response form with CSS
